name: Joe Farrell
description: '''Joseph Carl Firrantello''' (December 16, 1937 â€“ January 10, 1986), known as '''Joe Farrell''', was an American [[jazz]] multi-instrumentalist who primarily performed as a saxophonist and flutist. He is best known for a series of albums under his own name on the [[CTI Records|CTI]] record label and for playing in the initial incarnation of [[Chick Corea]]'s [[Return to Forever]] as well as the last.
